official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation in the medicare program that hospitals disclose the costs incurred by the hospital in providing services to patients.

summary.text: Hospital Cost Disclosure Act of 1992 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation in the Medicare program that hospitals disclose to patients upon their request a statement of the costs incurred by the hospital in providing services to the patient.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation in the medicare program that hospitals disclose the costs incurred by the hospital in providing services to patients.
